evidence.text: Person A: For you. My special guest.
Person B: Thank you, your Ozness.

Person B: Well- it doesn't have to be.
Person B: Is that-- your heart's desire?

Person A: I thought you might say that. It's the darndest thing, it's almost like-- I already know you.
Person B: Oh, your Ozness-- I knew you'd understand! That makes me so happy.
Person A: Well, that's what I love best. Making people happy.

Person A: No. Let me prove myself... Please. At least, let me try!
Person B: So. Which spell will you start with?
Person A: You're right. That's a harsh word. How about... scouts? They'll fly around Oz-- and report back any seditious Animal activity!
Person A: Elphaba... when I first got here, there was discord and discontent-- and back where I come from, everyone knows the best way to bring folks together is-- give them a really good enemy.
Person B: Read it. Cast a spell.
